alert.note: Alert for Orange County Coastal; Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued February 13 at 4:57AM PST until February 13 at 6:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...High temperatures of 86 to 92 degrees. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire. Orange County Coastal and Inland Areas. * WHEN...Through 6 PM today. * IMPACTS...The hot weather may cause heat illness.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay out of the midday sun. Young children should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. Take extra precautions if you work or spend time outside. When possible reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Orange County Coastal; Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire
